name: notifications
title: Email Notifications
description: If enabled, users can configure notification preferences from their account and they will receive emails.

name: account
title: Settings (Email & Password Change)
description: If enabled, users can change username, password and email address for the account in their user panel.

name: sessions
title: Active Sessions
description: If enabled, users can view all active sessions for their account, in their user panel.

name: locale
title: Locales (Language Change)
description: If enabled, users can switch languages in their user panel.

name: favorites
title: Favorites (Bookmarks)
description: If enabled, users can add panel pages to favorites and manage them from their account.

name: varnish
title: Varnish Caching
description: If enabled, users can use Vanrish Caching and enable/disable cache per domain.

name: docker
title: Docker (Containers)
description: If enabled, users can allocate resources to their containers and start/stop them when needed.

name: ftp
title: FTP accounts
description: If enabled, users can create and manage FTP accounts. The FTP server must be configured separately.

name: emails
title: Email accounts
description: If enabled, users can create and manage email accounts. The Mail server must be configured separately.

name: mysql
title: MySQL
description: If enabled, users can manage MySql databases and users.

name: remote_mysql
title: Remote MySQL
description: If enabled, users can enable/disable remote access to MySQL databases.

name: mysql_import
title: Import MySQL Databases
description: If enabled, users can import .sql files into MySQL databases from their user panel.

name: mysql_conf
title: MySQL Configuration
description: If enabled, users can edit MySQL Configuration from their user panel.

name: postgresql
title: PostgreSQL
description: If enabled, users can manage PostgreSQL databases and users.

name: remote_postgresql
title: Remote PostgreSQL
description: If enabled, users can enable/disable remote access to PostgreSQL databases.

name: postgresql_import
title: Import PostgreSQL Databases
description: If enabled, users can import .sql files into PostgreSQL databases from their user panel.

name: postgresql_conf
title: MySQL Configuration
description: If enabled, users can edit MySQL Configuration from their user panel.

name: pgamin
title: pgAdmin
description: If enabled, users can manage pgAmin and use it to connect to their Postgres databases.

name: php
title: PHP
description: If enabled, users can change PHP version for domains, set limits and set default version for new domains.

name: php_options
title: PHP Options
description: If enabled, users can edit configured PHP.INI directives using the Options page.

name: php_ini
title: PHP.INI Editor
description: If enabled, users can edit directly the PHP.INI file for any PHP version from their OpenPanel.

name: phpmyadmin
title: phpMyAdmin
description: If enabled, users can manage phpMyAdmin and use it to connect to their MySQL databases.

name: crons
title: Cronjobs
description: If enabled, users can configure cronjobs.

name: backups
title: Backups
description: If enabled, users can configure backups.

name: wordpress
title: WordPress
description: If enabled, WordPress can be installed using the Autoinstaller and users can use the WP Manager to manage websites.

name: website_builder
title: Website Builder
description: If enabled, users can create HTML websites using the GrapeJS drag-drop editor.

name: pm2
title: Applications
description: If enabled, containerized NodeJS and Python applications can be setup from the Autoinstaller.

name: autoinstaller
title: AutoInstaller
description: If enabled, users can use the Auto-Installer page to manage websites and install applications.

name: disk_usage
title: Disk Usage Explorer
description: If enabled, users can access the Disk Usage page to browse current disk usage per directories.

name: inodes
title: Inodes Explorer
description: If enabled, users can access the Inodes Usage page to browse current inodes usage per directories.

name: usage
title: Resources Usage
description: If enabled, docker stats are collected for containers and users can browse the data using the Resource Usage page

name: info
title: Server Info
description: If enabled, users can view their hosting plan limits and server information on Server Information page.

name: webserver_conf
title: Apache/Nginx Configuration
description: If enabled, users can edit the Nginx/Apache configuration for their webserver containers.

name: waf
title: Coraza WAF
description: If enabled, CorazaWAF is automatically enabled for new domains and users can enable/disable the protection per domain.

name: filemanager
title: File Manager
description: If enabled, users have access to the File Manager interface to manage website files (/var/www/html/ directory). Disable this feature for  'Email-only' or 'DNS-only' plans.

name: fix_permissions
title: Fix Permissions
description: If enabled, users have access to the Fix Permisisons tool to change owner and permissions for website files.

name: dns
title: DNS
description: If enabled, BIND9 server is run locally and DNS zone is created for new domains. Users can manage the records via Zone Editor interface.

name: redirects
title: Domain Redirects
description: If enabled, users can create and manage redirects for their domains.

name: domains
title: Domains
description: If enabled, users can add and manage domains. Disable this feature for  'Email-only' or 'DB-only' plans.

name: capitalize_domains
title: Capitalize Domains
description: If enabled, users can capitalize letters in their domains.

name: malware_scan
title: Malware Scanner
description: If enabled, ClamAV is run locally and domain's docroots are automatically scanned for malicious files. Users can exclude directories and view quarantined files.

name: domain_logs
title: Domain Logs
description: If enabled, userc can view raw webserver access logs for their domains.

name: goaccess
title: GoAccess
description: If enabled, GoAccess is run on schedule to generate HTML reports from Caddy domain logs. Users can view the reports from the Domain Logs page.

name: process_manager
title: Process Manager
description: If enabled, users can view/kill process from the Process Manager page.

name: redis
title: Redis
description: If enabled, users can configure Redis from their user panel.

name: memcached
title: Memcached
description: If enabled, users can configure Memcached from their user panel.

name: elasticsearch
title: Elasticsearch
description: If enabled, users can configure Elasticsearch from their user panel.

name: opensearch
title: Opensearch
description: If enabled, users can configure Opensearch from their user panel.

name: temporary_links
title: Temporary Links
description: If enabled, users can test their websites using temporary openpanel.org subdomains. Links expire after 15m.

name: login_history
title: Login History
description: If enabled, users can view last 20 IPs that logged into their account.

name: twofa
title: 2FA
description: If enabled, users enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for their account.

name: activity
title: Activity Log
description: If enabled, users can browse all recorded actions for their account.
